#summary List of tools used to create the software

= Tools used to create the software =

All of the below tools are open source:

  * [http://mingw.org/ MinGW]
  * GCC 4.4 from [http://www.tdragon.net/recentgcc/ TDM's MinGW GCC builds]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/ Grafx2] for drawing graphics
  * Uses [http://www.libsdl.org/ SDL] as the main graphics and sound interface
  * [http://notepad-plus.sourceforge.net/ Notepad++] to write code
